title: Vuelta a España GC Upheaval: Teams Scramble for Answers After O’Connor’s Surprise Attack
content:
Rivals admit major setback at Vuelta a España after O’Connor seizes race lead: 'Five teams pulling, and he took time on all of us.'

Read the full article at Vuelta a España GC Upheaval: Teams Scramble for Answers After O’Connor’s Surprise Attack on Velo.
author: sstokes
